LanguageData.WorkToBuild.label: 建築工数
LanguageData.WorkToBuild.description: 作成に必要な、素材やツールが用意されたのちに、構造物を建設するのにかかる時間です。
LanguageData.DoorOpenSpeed.label: ドア開閉速度
LanguageData.DoorOpenSpeed.description: The speed at which the door opens. Slow doors will slow down everyone who uses them.
LanguageData.BedRestEffectiveness.label: 眠りの質
LanguageData.BedRestEffectiveness.description: ここで寝ることで得られる、時間あたりに得られる睡眠量です。
LanguageData.TrapMeleeDamage.label: 罠のダメージ量
LanguageData.TrapMeleeDamage.description: How much damage this trap does on average. The actual damage in any instance will vary randomly.
LanguageData.TrapSpringChance.label: 発動率
LanguageData.TrapSpringChance.description: 罠に気がつかない生き物が通過した時に、罠が発動する確率です。
LanguageData.ResearchSpeedFactor.label: 研究速度係数
LanguageData.ResearchSpeedFactor.description: The speed at which people do research is multiplied by this value.
LanguageData.MedicalTendQualityOffset.label: 治療品質オフセット
LanguageData.MedicalTendQualityOffset.description: 治療品質の傾向を決めるオフセットです。
LanguageData.ImmunityGainSpeedFactor.label: 免疫獲得速度係数
LanguageData.ImmunityGainSpeedFactor.description: 免疫を獲得する速度に掛ける倍率です。
LanguageData.WorkTableWorkSpeedFactor.label: 工作台速度係数
LanguageData.WorkTableWorkSpeedFactor.description: 工作速度に掛ける倍率です。
LanguageData.WorkTableEfficiencyFactor.label: work efficiency factor
LanguageData.WorkTableEfficiencyFactor.description: Work efficiency is multiplied by this value.
LanguageData.JoyGainFactor.label: recreation power
LanguageData.JoyGainFactor.description: How effectively this item entertains people and fulfills the need for recreation.
LanguageData.SurgerySuccessChanceFactor.label: 外科手術成功率
LanguageData.SurgerySuccessChanceFactor.description: A multiplier to the chance that a surgery will succeed when performed here. Surgery success chances are also affected by many other factors, including the surgeon's ability and medicine used.
